articles.author: Jessica Hamzelou
articles.title: WHO declares coronavirus outbreak an international health emergency
articles.description: Cases of human-to-human transmission of the Wuhan coronavirus have been confirmed in several countries, and the World Health Organization declared the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern
articles.content:
By Jessica Hamzelou
The WHO urged public health officials to prepare to identify and isolate people infected with the new coronavirus
Anna Gowthorpe/PA Wire
The new coronavirus represents a public health emergency of international concern, the World Health… [+2087 chars]

articles.author: Michael Le Page
articles.title: New coronavirus: How soon will a treatment be ready and will it work?
articles.description: Developing new therapies to treat the Wuhan coronavirus could take a year or more, but there are some existing drugs and experimental treatments that might help save lives
articles.content:
By Michael Le Page
Pharmacy employees in Shanghai, China during the coronavirus outbreak
Credit EDWIN REMSBERG, VW PICS / SCIENCE PHOTO LIBRARY
So far, around a quarter of people infected during the outbreak of a new coronavirus have developed severe respi… [+4602 chars]
